title: Food Lovers' Village Mystery Series - Leslie Budewitz
description:
01. Death Al Dente [Food Lovers' Village Mystery, #1] - Leslie Budewitz
 
The town of Jewel Bay, MontanaÃ¢â‚¬â€known as a Food Lovers' VillageÃ¢â‚¬â€is obsessed with homegrown and homemade Montana fare. So when Erin Murphy takes over her familyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s century-old general store, she turns it into a boutique market filled with local delicacies. But ErinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s freshly booming business might go rotten when a former employee turns up deadÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

MurphyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Mercantile, known as the Merc, has been a staple in Jewel Bay for over a hundred years. To celebrate their recent makeover as a gourmet food market, Erin has organized a town festival, Festa di Pasta, featuring the culinary goods of Jewel BayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s finestÃ¢â‚¬â€including her mother FrescaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s delicious Italian specialties.

But ErinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sweet success is soured when the shopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s former manager, Claudette, is found dead behind the Merc on the FestaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s opening night. With rival chef James Angelo stirring up rumors that FrescaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sauce recipes were stolen from Claudette, ErinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mother is under close scrutiny. Now Erin will have to hunt down some new suspects, or both her family and her store might wind up in hot waterÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

02. Crime Rib [Food Lovers' Village Mystery, #2] - Leslie Budewitz
 
Gourmet food market owner Erin Murphy is determined to get Jewel Bay, MontanaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s, scrumptious local fare some national attention. But her scheme for culinary celebrity goes up in flames when the townÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s big break is interrupted by murder . . .

Food Preneurs, one of the hottest cooking shows on TV, has decided to feature Jewel Bay in an upcoming episode, and everyone in town is preparing for their close-ups, including the crew at the Glacier Mercantile, aka the Merc. Not only is Erin busy remodeling her courtyard into a relaxing dining area, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s organizing a steak-cooking competition between three of Jewel BayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hottest chefs to be featured on the program.

But ErinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s plans get scorched when one of the contending cooks is found dead. With all the drama going on behind the scenes, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hard to figure out who didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have a motive to off the saucy contestant. Now, to keep the townÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reputation from crashing and burning on national television, Erin will have to grill some suspects to smoke out the killer . . .

03. Butter Off Dead [Food Lovers' Village Mystery, #3] - Leslie Budewitz
 
As the national bestselling Food LoversÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Village Mysteries continue, the merchants of Jewel Bay, Montana, try to heat up chilly winter business with a new film festival. But their plans are sent reeling when a dangerous killer dims the lights on a local vendor...

In an attempt to woo tourists to Jewel Bay and cheer up the townies, Erin Murphy, manager of the specialty local foods market known as the Merc, is organizing the First Annual Food LoversÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Film Festival, filled with classic foodie flicks and local twists on favorite movie treats. But when her partner in planning, painter Christine Vandeberg, is found dead only days before the curtain rises, Erin suspects someone is attempting to stop the films from rolling.

To make matters worse, NickÃ¢â‚¬â€ErinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s brother and ChristineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s beauÃ¢â‚¬â€has top billing on the suspect list. Convinced her brother is innocent and determined that the show must go on, Erin has to find whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s really to blame before Nick gets arrested or the festival gets shut down. But the closer she gets to the killer, the more likely it becomes that sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be the next person cut from the program
